name: Facebook eyepleasing background
description: This style will give facebook a beautifull cream coloured background. Just try this once and i hope that you ll love it. I made it because there are a lot of facebook background styles out there but none of them is as simple and as beautiful as this one. Please leave a comment bellow to show your appreciation
additional_info: this doesn't fully change your fb background, it just alters it a little.
